name: DEEDSELF
description:
Deedself is a point-and-click casual simulation game that focuses on the character of the player. 

In this game, the player will be given a scene or an event where he must choose what action he should take according to their humanity and conscience. Choices are divided into good actions and bad actions, but the player is still free to choose what he wants. At the end of each chapter, all player choices will decide what kind of character the player becomes.

The ending of the game will reflect the character traits of all players' choices.

*the game is available in both English and Bahasa Indonesia.

#ICE #PMGD2022Batch1
